Text:

Is Softsubs better, isn't?

Yes - sorry Shenmue; this is my first rip of a subtitled movie, so I screwed up with the subtitles.  I actually did make softsubs, and was surprised to see two sets of subtitles in the file -- I had forgotten to untick something, or something.  Forgive me?
Great upload m8!  All is forgiven, cheers
Please seed -- stuck at 31%.  Will seed back.  Am seeding one of your other ones.

this movie fucking rocks..does anyone know where to get the soundtrack?? i have prokofiev's romeo and juliet ballet music which some of the soundtrack includes songs from (the knights dance is the main song in Of Freaks And Men)...i want that opera song that is in the beginning of the movie when she puts the record on..also i want all the songs of the siamese twins singing...Help!!!
